MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.33PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55AM on 15th April 2021.
